title: U.S. honey imports by country of origin 2017
summary: This statistic presents the global leading 10 countries based on coffee area harvested in 2017 . In that year , mexico harvested an area of 638.6 thousand hectares of green coffee and was ranked sixth among coffee-growing countries worldwide .
gold: This statistic gives a ranking of the ten countries from which the U.S. imported the largest amount of honey in 2017 . More than 15,700 metric tons of honey were imported from Canada that year .
